roborally.model
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  roborally.model.Board

public class Board
extends Object

This class represents a board.

Author:
Ben Adriaenssens (ben.adriaenssens@student.kuleuven.be) - WtkCws, Toon Nolten (toon.nolten@student.kuleuven.be) - CwsElt.
Invariants:
  • WIDTH is always a positive integer number less than Long.MAX_VALUE.
        0 <= WIDTH <= long.MAX_VALUE
  • HEIGHT is always a positive integer number less than Long.MAX_VALUE.
        0 <= HEIGHT <= long.MAX_VALUE

    Board

    public Board(long width,
             long height)
      throws IllegalArgumentException
    Initializes a new board with the given width and height.

    Parameters:
    width - The width of this board.
    height - The height of this board.
    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The given width or height is less than 0.
        width < 0 || height < 0
    Method Detail

    merge

    public void merge(Board board2)
    Merge this Board with another board.

    Parameters:
    board2 - The board to merge into this board.
    Effect:
    Each element on board2 is moved to the corresponding position on this Board if it can be placed there.
        if (board2 != null)
          for occupiedPosition2 in board2.getOccupiedPositions()
              if (isValidPosition(occupiedPosition2))
                  for element in occupiedPosition2.getElements()
                      position = Position.newPosition(occupiedPosition2.X,
                          occupiedPosition2.Y, this)
                      if (position.canContainElement(element))
                          putElement(position, elem)
                      else
                          element.terminate()
          board2.terminate()

    putElement

    public void putElement(Position position,
                       Element element)
    Place an element at the given position on this Board.

    Parameters:
    position - The position the element will be placed at.
    element - The element to place at the given position.
    Postcondition:
    If the given position is a valid position for this Board then the position will be an occupied position.
        if (isValidPosition(position))
          new.isOccupiedPosition(position)
    Effect:
    If the given position is a valid position for this Board then the element will be added to the position
        if (isValidPosition(position))
          (new position).getElements().contains(element)

    removeElement

    public void removeElement(Element element)
    Remove an element from this Board.

    Parameters:
    element - The element to remove from this Board.
    Effect:
    Remove the element from it's position.
        element.getPosition().removeElement(element)

    getElementsAt

    public Set<Element> getElementsAt(Position position)
    Return all the elements at the given position.

    Parameters:
    position - The position whose elements will be returned.
    Returns:
    If the given position is an occupied position return the elements at that position otherwise return an empty set.
        if (isOccupiedPosition(position))
          result == position.getElements()
        else
          result == new HashSet()

    getElementsOf

    public Set<Element> getElementsOf(Class<?> type)
    Return all the elements of the given type.

    Parameters:
    type - The type of the elements returned by this method.
    Returns:
    Return a set containing all elements of the given type on this Board.
        for occupiedPosition in getOccupiedPositions()
          result.addAll(occupiedPosition.getElementsOf(type))

    terminate

    public void terminate()
    Terminate this Board.

    Postcondition:
    new.isTerminated() = true
    Effect:
    Every occupied position on this Board is terminated.
        for position in getOccupiedPositions()
          position.terminate()
